channel.title: How woud i do this?
channel.description: how would i make it so that you cant use a bank booth while dueling?

item.title: How woud i do this?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

if(inDuel = true)

How dare i not put

if(inDuel == true)

[/quote]
That is still fail.[/quote]

item.title: How woud i do this?
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:5, topic:152312”][quote author=bl4ck ra1nb0w link=topic=208332.msg1827996#msg1827996 date=1192672446]
where-ever it is…

lets see… if it’s

openBank() { if(inDuel = true) { sendMessage("you can't bank while in a duel"); } else { //open bank things go here //basically the programming to open the bank } }

openBank() is just an example of w\e your bank void is…
[/quote]

You fail soooooo hard.

if (inDuel = true)???
I believe that is called an epic fail.[/quote]That’s An epic Flame.Like always,What else is new?
You flame people to make yourself feel better? Rofl

Read full topic

item.title: How woud i do this?
item.dc:creator: @bl4ck_ra1nb0w bl4ck ra1nb0w
item.description:
@bl4ck_ra1nb0w wrote:

If you use a boolean to say that you are in a duel… like… for if you die you lose nothing…

add this in your bank void

if(inDuel = true) { sendMessage("you can't bank while in a duel"); } else { //open bank things go here }

Read full topic
